00083                     :(CPWindow)aWindow atIndex:(unsigned)anIndex
00084 {
00085     // We will have to adjust the z-index of all windows starting at this index.
00086     var count = [_windows count],
00087         zIndex = (anIndex == CPNotFound ? count : anIndex),
00088         isVisible = aWindow._isVisible;
00089     
00090     // If the window is already a resident of this layer, remove it.    
00091     if (isVisible)
00092     {
00093         zIndex = MIN(zIndex, aWindow._index);
00094         [_windows removeObjectAtIndex:aWindow._index];
00095     }
00096     else
00097         ++count;
00098     
00099     if (anIndex == CPNotFound || anIndex >= count)
00100         [_windows addObject:aWindow];
00101     else
00102         [_windows insertObject:aWindow atIndex:anIndex];
00103     
00104     // Adjust all the affected z-indexes.
00105     for (; zIndex < count; ++zIndex)
00106     {
00107         _windows[zIndex]._index = zIndex;
00108         _windows[zIndex]._DOMElement.style.zIndex = zIndex;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // If the window is not already a resident of this layer, add it.
00112     if (aWindow._DOMElement.parentNode !== _DOMElement)
00113     {
00114         CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, aWindow._DOMElement);
00115 
00116         aWindow._isVisible = YES;
00117         
00118         if ([aWindow isFullBridge])
00119             [aWindow setFrame:[aWindow._platformWindow usableContentFrame]];
00120     }
00121 }
